sentences.en: A range of ointments and creams is available for the treatment of eczema.
sentences.cn: 有一系列的药膏和乳剂可用于湿疹的治疗。

sentences.en: He received ointment for his flaking skin.
sentences.cn: 医生给他开了治疗脱皮的软膏。

sentences.en: Rachel seems to be the one fly in the ointment of Caroline's smooth life.
sentences.cn: 蕾切尔似乎是卡罗琳一帆风顺的生活中唯一的麻烦。

sentences.en: Rub ointment onto the wasp sting.
sentences.cn: 在黄蜂刺伤处涂些药膏.

sentences.en: Rub this ointment on your skin and let it work in.
sentences.cn: 将这油膏擦在你的皮肤上,让它渗透进去.

sentences.en: The doctor painted my wound with ointment.
sentences.cn: 医生给我的伤口敷上药膏.

sentences.en: The druggist has recommended me to try this ointment for sunburn.
sentences.cn: 药房老板劝我试用这种药膏治疗晒斑.

sentences.en: The nurse applied some ointment to the cut to stop the bleeding.
sentences.cn: 护士在伤口上搽了些药膏来止血.

sentences.en: The only fly in the ointment was the bad weather.
sentences.cn: 唯一美中不足之处是恶劣的天气.

sentences.en: The surgeon applied some ointment to my burnt fingers.
sentences.cn: 外科医生在我烧伤的指头上敷了一些药膏.

sentences.en: They had dressed his varicose ulcer with soothing ointment.
sentences.cn: 他们在静脉曲张的疮口上抹了清凉的油膏.

sentences.en: This herbal ointment will help to close up your wound quickly.
sentences.cn: 这种中草药膏会帮助你的伤口很快愈合.

sentences.en: We put some ointment and a bandage on his knee.
sentences.cn: 我们在他的膝盖上涂了些药膏并打上了绷带。

sentences.en: We were having a picnic, when suddenly there came a downpour , which was rather a fly in the ointment.
sentences.cn: 当我们正在举行野餐的时候, 忽然大雨倾盆, 未免大煞风景.

sentences.en: Your foot will feel better after the application of this ointment.
sentences.cn: 敷用这药膏后,你的脚会感到舒服些.

trans.tran_en: a soft cream that you rub into your skin, especially as a medical treatment
